title: Synesthesia
content: Lead a team that grew and expanded live music visual software

sections.title: Project Overview
sections.content: I worked with a team to grow the capabilities, market, and brand of a growing live visual software. Synesthesia offers users a simple and straightforward way to leverage and control generative graphics tailored for live music. While working on Synesthesia, I was responsible for elevating the companies marketing, community outreach, support, user experience, and engineering output. I also managed a team of artists and developers that contributed to the in-app marketplace. Below are some of the features that I designed and built.

sections.title: Built-in Editor
sections.content: An integrated editor that allows users to create and modify scenes in real time. Includes advanced features like auto-compile and auto-back, as well as custom linting based on the state of the editor. Additionally, the editor supports side by side comparison with other scenes and diffing with the current scenes backups.

sections.title: Marketplace
sections.content: Designed and developed the majority of the in-app marketplace. This includes: interior page design, custom API structure, sales analytics and reporting, stripe integration, and user experience.  Additionally I oversaw its growth and managed the artists and developers that contributed their works for sale.

images.alt: Marketplace Built in app scene preview side by side

sections.title: Media Player
sections.content: Drastically improved the media playback capabilities of Synesthesia with a new UI panel, more control to the user, and improved performance and file support. Leveraging the open source library FFMPEG, I built a new media player back-end from the ground up. With the introduction of a new media player interface, users are given powerful control over custom media use inside of the application.

sections.title: Playlist
sections.content: Overhauled the UI and UX surrounding a core feature: playlists. This included a new grid view, as well as drag-and-drop functionality for faster organization. Additionally, improved performance on this component by over 100%.
